name: lunges
description: take a big step back with your left leg. dip your left knee toward the floor. kick the floor away with your left leg. alternate legs and repeat

name: push-up
description: lay on your stomach. place each hand so that the thumb is tucked vertically under the armpit. keep the body rigid while pushing away from the floor. lower your body - not all the way! repeat

name: squats
description: sit back and squat downward until your thighs are parallel with the floor. push the knees outward while kicking the floor away. repeat

name: bent-over row
description: bend over with a straight back and a slight bend in the knees. pinch your shoulderblades together as you pull the weights upward toward you. control the weight back down. repeat

name: wall sit
description: stand with your back against a wall and squat until your thighs are parallel with the floor. hold

name: bicep curl
description: keep your back straight and elbow pinned to your side. contract the bicep and pull the weight towards you. controlled release back down. repeat

name: shoulder press
description: raise each dumbbell infront of you with arms bent 90 degrees and palms facing eachother. wrist flat. push the weights upward until full extension. control them on the way down. repeat

name: plank
description: lay on your stomach. raise your body onto your elbows and toes. elbows vertically in line with your shoulders. hold
